attributes.action: make it an offence to use the word "free" in advertising or sales promotions when it is conditional on paying for something
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The word "Free" in advertising is being increasingly used when what is on offers is not free at all. The cost of the so called free item is included in the price of something else. This petition calls for changes to advertising regulations to ban such claims unless the buyer/client can genuinely walk away with or gain the item without parting with any money at all.
